languages.text: Permanently grants +1 psy-rating and +30% chance to trigger perils of the warp to user

languages.text: The user permanently gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +30% more chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
languages.original_text: Permanently grants +1 psy-rating and +30% chance to trigger perils of the warp to user

traits.locale_text: The user permanently gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +30% more chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
The user permanently gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +30% more chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
The user permanently gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +30% more chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者は永続的に +1の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}を得る。{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な歪み{/g}が発生する確率が +30%増加する。
languages.original_text: The user permanently gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +30% more chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者は永続的に +1の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}を得る。{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な歪み{/g}が発生する確率が +30%増加する。

languages.text: L'utilisateur gagne un bonus permanent de +1 à l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} et +30 % de chances supplémentaires de déclencher {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Périls du Warp{/g}.
languages.original_text: The user permanently gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +30% more chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur gagne un bonus permanent de +1 à l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} et +30 % de chances supplémentaires de déclencher {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Périls du Warp{/g}.

languages.text: El usuario obtiene permanentemente +1 a su {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} y +30 % a su probabilidad de desencadenar las {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: The user permanently gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +30% more chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El usuario obtiene permanentemente +1 a su {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} y +30 % a su probabilidad de desencadenar las {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}永久提高1级，但{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}的触发几率也会永久提高30%。
languages.original_text: The user permanently gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +30% more chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}永久提高1级，但{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}的触发几率也会永久提高30%。

languages.text: Der Nutzer erhält dauerhaft +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} und +30 % Chance, {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} zu bewirken.
languages.original_text: The user permanently gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} and +30% more chance to trigger {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Nutzer erhält dauerhaft +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} und +30 % Chance, {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g} zu bewirken.

languages.text: Персонаж навсегда получает +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтингу/g} и повышенный на 30% шанс вызвать {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}.

languages.text: Kullanıcı, kalıcı olarak +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerini{/g} tetikleme olasılığı +%30 artar.
